information on the outcome of the appeal or any further steps in the case the judgment in the case involved the dissolution of a joint ownership between two parties and the assignment of specific properties to each party one party was ordered to pay a balance of €4100000 to the other party along with other monetary obligations the ruling also assigned a garage and a garden to each party the legal text discusses various articles from the civil code related to the case the case took place in the court of bergamo italy and involved a dispute over the division of a real estate property the court received a writ summons from one party seeking division while the other party claimed ownership the court ordered a technical consultancy to address building abuses and cadastral nonconformities the case is now proceeding towards a decision the decision was made on september 29 2022 and involved the allocation of an apartment garage and green areas as well as reimbursement for litigation costs the court determined that the property could be divided among the coowners or sold at auction the court ordered the allocation of the apartment to one party based on convenience and longterm use the allowance for exclusive occupancy was calculated by a consultant the costs of litigation would be offset and the judgment would be transcribed by the land agency the specific details of the property division were not provided the judgment in the case involved the dissolution of a partnership and the assignment of specific properties to each party one party was ordered to pay a balance of
